content.description: SDS in the center of the boulder right hand on a crimp and left hand on a gaston. Move left and then straight up to a jug topout. This is a very short boulder problem.
content.location: Up and climber's left of the mushroom boulder

content.description: Start matched standing on the large left angled feature with hands on the huge jug shelf at the top. Use high feel and heel to connect with a pair of crimp rails and fire to a better rail. Top out into crevice on right. Amazing line.

Start sitting below "Teenage Wasteland" on two broken flat holds. Gain a right sloper and then an input left side pull and fire to the right edge of the feature. Top out as for Teenage Wasteland. See Beta photo for details
On the "Slam Dunk" boulder - Start sitting on the shelf. Move to a left crimp, then a good right input and make a very long move to a bad left sloper. Match the sloper feature and dunk it. Classic.
content.location: Slam Dunk Boulder just below and left of Basement Boulder

content.description: An absolute atrocious boulder problem but it had to be done. Start as for Man Cave but break right and use some footwork to match the start holds for "Teenage Dirtbag." Finish that climb. An ass dragger if there ever was one...The presence of this line dampens the quality of "Man Cave," which would otherwise be of extremely high quality. Nonetheless it is there and had to be done. See beta photo for details

On the "Basement Boulder" - Start seated in the cave matched on an undercling feature. Move up left to a large input crimp and then work right eventually reaching some amazing sculpted right side pulls and utilizing an uncommonly high quality left pinch feature to gain the large block. Top out as for "Teenage Wasteland"Project - continue leftward before gaining final jug - work left on right slopers and left pinch side pulls to gain sharp face crimp. Hard!
content.location: Located on the "Basement Boulder" just left of Tendon Terrorist across from Mychotic.

content.description: On the Slam Dunk Boulder. Start sitting on low shelf and move up and slightly left through good edges and crimps to gain a perfectly sculpted 1-pad crimp rail. Huck for the lip jug. Great line!
content.location: Slam Dunk boulder is just below the basement boulder

content.description: Start on a large ball feature on the bottom right side of the Basement Boulder arete. Climb the arete... bullet, gritty rock quality the whole way. Variation - climb from start of Teenage Wasteland into arete. Fun warm up.

This area is the set of boulders surrounding the mushroom boulder which contains one of the forest's classics (Mycotic Break - V9). This mountain project area contains updates and new climbs.The Basement Boulder and Slam Dunk Boulder are located 75 yards left of the Mushroom Boulder and just downhill and left from Tendon Terrorist.Much more potential exists - updates to come soon.
